title: Bootstrap Breadcrumbs
subject: Bootstrap
theory:
## Location Traignment
Indicate the current page's location within a navigational hierarchy.

### Structure
* `nav (aria-label="breadcrumb")`
* `ol.breadcrumb`
* `li.breadcrumb-item`
* `.active` for current page (no link).
